Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Outstanding! You've reclaimed the parking lot and forced Banktania to withdraw!

Name: Redline
Text: Unbelievable! We've lost the parking lot? What's going on?

Name: Redline
Text: Next, they'll be able to rescue the Finance Leader!

Name: Redline
Text: You meddling twerps, I better fall back. He might be useful while I regroup.

Name: Redline
Text: I'll be better prepared next time. You'll be eatting my dust!
